SMA(20)"}],"OrderBy":[{"Direction":1,"Expression":{"Column":{"Expression":{"SourceRef":{"Source":"r"}},"Property":"Date"}}}]},"drillFilterOtherVisuals":true,"filterSortOrder":3,"hasDefaultSort":true,"objects":{"script":[{"properties":{"source":{"expr":{"Literal":{"Value":"'# The following code to create a dataframe and remove duplicated rows is always executed and acts as a preamble for your script: 

# dataset = pandas.DataFrame(Year, Quarter, Month, Day, open, close, high, low, BB_lower(20, 2), BB_upper(20, 2))
# dataset = dataset.drop_duplicates()

# Paste or type your script code here:

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import mplfinance as mpf

# Convert and clean date
dataset["Date"] = pd.to_datetime(dataset["Date"], errors=''coerce'')
dataset = dataset.dropna(subset=["Date"])
dataset.set_index("Date", inplace=True)

# Drop rows missing Bollinger bands
dataset = dataset.dropna(subset=["BB_upper(20, 2)", "BB_lower(20, 2)"])

# Plot if bands exist
if "BB_upper(20, 2)" in dataset.columns and "BB_lower(20, 2)" in dataset.columns:
    addplots = [
        mpf.make_addplot(dataset["BB_upper(20, 2)"], color=''blue''),
        mpf.make_addplot(dataset["BB_lower(20, 2)"], color=''blue'')
    ]

    style = mpf.make_mpf_style(
        base_mpf_style=''yahoo'',
        figcolor=''#CCCCCC'',
        facecolor=''#CCCCCC'',
        rc={
            ''axes.edgecolor'': ''#CCCCCC'',
            ''axes.linewidth'': 2,
            ''xtick.color'': ''black'',
            ''ytick.color'': ''black''
        }
    )

    fig, axes = mpf.plot(
        dataset,
        type=''candle'',
        style=style,
        addplot=addplots,
        figsize=(8.5, 5.74),
        returnfig=True
    )

    if not isinstance(axes, list):
        axes = [axes]

    for ax in axes:
        ax.tick_params(axis=''both'', which=''major'', labelsize=11)
        ax.set_xlabel(''Date'', fontsize=13, fontname="Segoe UI",fontweight="bold")
        ax.set_ylabel(''Price'', fontsize=13, fontname="Segoe UI",fontweight="bold")
        ax.yaxis.grid(True, which=''major'', linestyle=''--'', linewidth=1, color=''white'', alpha=0.7)
        
    plt.show()'"}}},"provider":{"expr":{"Literal":{"Value":"'Python'"}}}}}]},"vcObjects":{"title":[{"properties":{"text":{"expr":{"Literal":{"Value":"'Volatility Analysis : Bollinger Bands'"}}},"titleWrap":{"expr":{"Literal":{"Value":"true"}}},"fontFamily":{"expr":{"Literal":{"Value":"'''Segoe UI'', wf_segoe-ui_normal, helvetica, arial, sans-serif'"}}},"fontSize":{"expr":{"Literal":{"Value":"13D"}}},"bold":{"expr":{"Literal":{"Value":"true"}}},"alignment":{"expr":{"Literal":{"Value":"'center'"}}}}}],"background":[{"properties":{"show":{"expr":{"Literal":{"Value":"true"}}},"color":{"solid":{"color":{"expr":{"ThemeDataColor":{"ColorId":0,"Percent":-0.2}}}}},"transparency":{"expr":{"Literal":{"Value":"0D"}}}}}],"padding":[{"properties":{"top":{"expr":{"Literal":{"Value":"5D"}}},"bottom":{"expr":{"Literal":{"Value":"0D"}}},"left":{"expr":{"Literal":{"Value":"0D"}}},"right":{"expr":{"Literal":{"Value":"0D"}}}}}],"border":[{"properties":{"show":{"expr":{"Literal":{"Value":"true"}}},"color":{"solid":{"color":{"expr":{"ThemeDataColor":{"ColorId":0,"Percent":-0.3}}}}},"radius":{"expr":{"Literal":{"Value":"18D"}}},"width":{"expr":{"Literal":{"Value":"1D"}}}}}],"stylePreset":[{"properties":{"name":{"expr":{"Literal":{"Value":"'Default'"}}}}}],"lockAspect":[{"properties":{"show":{"expr":{"Literal":{"Value":"false"}}}}}]}}}
